openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: "1.0"
  title: Directory Facilitator
  description: API of the DF
paths:
  /api/alive:
    get:
      description: indicates if df is alive
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK - clonemap information
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
  /api/df/{masid}/svc:
    parameters:
    - $ref: '#/components/parameters/masID'
    get:
      description: returns all services within MAS
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK - services
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Service'
    post:
      description: register a new service in MAS
      requestBody:
        description: service to be registered
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Service'
        required: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Created
  /api/df/{masid}/graph:
    parameters:
    - $ref: '#/components/parameters/masID'
    get:
      description: returns the graph of a mas
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK - graph
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Graph'
    post:
      description: create graph for MAS
      requestBody:
        description: new graph
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Graph'
        required: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Created
    put:
      description: update graph for MAS
      requestBody:
        description: new graph
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Graph'
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Updated
  /api/df/{masid}/svc/desc/{desc}:
    parameters:
    - $ref: '#/components/parameters/masID'
    - $ref: '#/components/parameters/desc'
    get:
      description: search for service in MAS
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK - all matching services
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Service'
  /api/df/{masid}/svc/desc/{desc}/node/{nodeid}/dist/{dist}:
    parameters:
    - $ref: '#/components/parameters/masID'
    - $ref: '#/components/parameters/desc'
    - $ref: '#/components/parameters/nodeID'
    - $ref: '#/components/parameters/dist'
    get:
      description: search for service in MAS within specified distance
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK - all matching services
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Service'
  /api/df/{masid}/svc/id/{svcid}:
    parameters:
    - $ref: '#/components/parameters/masID'
    - $ref: '#/components/parameters/svcID'
    get:
      description: returns service in MAS
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK - service
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Service'
    delete:
      description: deregisters service
      responses:
        '200':
          description: succesful deletion
components:
  parameters:
    masID:
      name: masid
      in: path
      description: ID of MAS
      required: true
      schema:
        type: integer
    agentID:
      name: agentid
      in: path
      description: ID of agent
      required: true
      schema:
        type: integer
    svcID:
      name: svcid
      in: path
      description: ID of service
      required: true
      schema:
        type: integer
    desc:
      name: desc
      in: path
      description: description of service
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
    nodeID:
      name: nodeid
      in: path
      description: ID of node
      required: true
      schema:
        type: integer
    dist:
      name: dist
      in: path
      description: maximum distance from node
      required: true
      schema:
        type: integer
  schemas:
    Graph:
      description: stores one mas graph for topological search
      properties:
        node:
          description: list of graph nodes
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Node'
        edge:
          description: list of graph edges
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Edge'
      required:
      - node
      - edge
    Node:
      description: graph node
      properties:
        id:
          description: unique ID of node
          type: integer
        agents:
          description: list of agents attached to node
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
      required:
      - id
    Edge:
      description: one edge of graph
      properties:
        n1:
          description: id of node 1
          type: integer
        n2:
          description: id of node 2
          type: integer
        weight:
          description: weight of edge
          type: number
      required:
      - n1
      - n2
      - weight
    Service:
      description: DF service
      properties:
        id:
          description: id of service
          type: integer
        agentid:
          description: id of agent which registered service
          type: integer
        nodeid:
          description: id of node
          type: integer
        masid:
          description: id of MAS
          type: integer
        createdat:
          description: time of creation
          type: string
        changedat:
          description: time of last change
          type: string
        desc:
          description: description of service
          type: string
        dist:
          description: distance
          type: number
      required:
      - id
      - agentid
      - nodeid
      - masid
      - createdat
      - changedat
      - desc
      - dist

Error: notImplemented: path "/api/alive": get: responses: 200: contents: unsupported content types: [text/plain]
